name: Larks & Owls
shortDescription: A cozy spot with big windows, specialty coffee, and homemade pastries — perfect for work sessions or slow mornings with a book.
longDescription: Our café is a warm and welcoming space where quality coffee meets calm atmosphere. We serve freshly brewed drinks made from locally roasted beans, along with homemade treats. Whether you're here to work, relax, or catch up with friends — it’s a place to slow down and enjoy the moment.

name: Beans Lab coffee-bar
shortDescription: A cozy spot with big windows, specialty brews, and homemade snacks — perfect for creative work or slow mornings at Beans Lab coffee-bar.
longDescription: Beans Lab coffee-bar is a space where craft coffee meets calm, creative energy. We brew with care using locally roasted beans and serve fresh pastries daily. Whether you're diving into work or just taking a break, Beans Lab invites you to pause, recharge, and enjoy.

name: 16.coffee
shortDescription: A sleek coffee spot with cool vibes, strong espresso, and plenty of space to chill or catch up — made for the city’s young and curious.
longDescription: 16.coffee is a modern hangout for coffee lovers who live fast but pause with purpose. We serve bold brews, minimalist style, and good energy all day long. Whether you're grabbing a to-go or staying for the playlist — this is your go-to spot to vibe, connect, and recharge.

name: BOODOO KAVU
shortDescription: A bold corner for wild flavors, vinyl beats, and moody lights — BOODOO KAVU is where coffee gets a little magic.
longDescription: BOODOO KAVU isn’t just a coffee bar — it’s a vibe. We mix rich espresso with raw energy, serve it with a side of vinyl, art, and dimmed lights. Come for the caffeine, stay for the mood. No rules, just good taste.

name: DOT. MATCHA BAR & COFFEE
shortDescription: Minimalist coffee bar with calm vibes, clean aesthetics, and perfectly balanced drinks — ideal for those who love mindful coffee and tea moments.
longDescription: DOT. MATCHA BAR & COFFEE is a place for connoisseurs of aesthetics, harmony and new flavors. The main star of the menu is matcha in all its manifestations. In addition to matcha, they serve specialty coffee and minimalist desserts that complement the atmosphere of calm and focus. The interior is bright, spacious, and restrained, making DOT an ideal place for a mindful break, work, or a leisurely meeting. This is a new generation coffee shop - quiet, stylish, inspired.

name: Astra Coffeebar
shortDescription: A stylish neighborhood coffee bar with top-tier espresso, creative drinks, and a cozy local vibe.
longDescription: Astra Coffeebar is a sleek and welcoming spot in Kyiv known for its expertly brewed coffee and warm community feel. The menu features espresso classics, creative signature drinks, and pastries from local bakeries. With its minimal design, curated playlists, and friendly baristas, Astra offers the perfect blend of quality and comfort. Whether you're grabbing a quick cortado or staying for a slow weekend chat — this place always feels just right

name: Etre Sofie
shortDescription: A refined French‑style café‑restaurant by Sofiyska Square, offering elegant interiors, seasonal menu, and live music.
longDescription: Being Sofie (Etre Sofie) is a combination of French elegance and modern Kyiv cuisine, located in the historic 18th-century Consistory right on the territory of the St. Sophia of Kyiv Conservation Area. The interior creates the atmosphere of a Parisian living room: oak parquet, antique furniture, mirrors, chandeliers and summer terraces - one of them even has a “secret garden” overlooking the bell tower.

name: Paul
shortDescription: A French-style bakery café chain offering freshly baked breads, delicate pastries, and quality coffee in a cozy, Parisian-inspired setting.
longDescription: PAUL is a part of the French chain brand with a history dating back to 1889, which is represented in more than 750 locations in 47 countries. In Kyiv, the coffee shop is located near the Golden Gate. Interior is designed in classical style: black and white decor, wooden elements, light warm colors.

name: Blur coffee shop lviv
shortDescription: A stylish spot in the heart of Lviv with artisan coffee, elegant interior, and peaceful atmosphere — great for slow mornings or focused work.
longDescription: Blur is a cozy and stylish café tucked away in the center of Lviv. Known for its carefully crafted coffee, minimalist design, and serene vibe, it’s a perfect escape from the city buzz. Whether you're catching up with a friend, diving into a book, or working remotely, Blur offers a calming space with great music, fast Wi-Fi, and exceptional brews. Their baristas take pride in both espresso-based drinks and alternative methods like V60 or AeroPress. Light brunch options and homemade desserts are also on the menu, making it a great spot to recharge any time of day.

name: Cafe Vitalnia
shortDescription: A charming café with vintage décor, homemade desserts, and a soulful vibe — ideal for cozy talks or peaceful solo moments.
longDescription: Cafe Vitalnia is a soulful and intimate coffee spot nestled in a quiet corner of Lviv. The interior blends vintage charm with homey touches — wooden furniture, old books, warm lighting. Here, time slows down. They serve specialty coffee with attention to detail, alongside homemade cakes, pies, and light breakfast options. It's the kind of place where you come for a cup and stay for the atmosphere. Whether you're writing, reading, or chatting with a friend, Vitalnia offers comfort and inspiration in equal measure.

name: Respublika Sadu
shortDescription: A lush café full of greenery, fresh air, and natural light — perfect for nature lovers and mindful coffee breaks.
longDescription: Respublika Sadu is a unique urban oasis in Lviv that brings the beauty of nature indoors. Surrounded by vibrant plants and filled with natural light, this café creates a refreshing and peaceful atmosphere. The menu includes specialty coffee, herbal teas, healthy snacks, and fresh pastries — all served in a space that feels like a cozy greenhouse. Whether you're meeting a friend or enjoying some quiet alone time, Respublika Sadu offers a chance to recharge in a calm, green environment. The space is also pet-friendly and perfect for mindful moments away from the city's rush.

name: Alterkava
shortDescription: A tiny take-away coffee spot with big flavor — top-notch espresso, quick service, and friendly baristas right near the city center.
longDescription: Alterkava is a minimalist coffee stand located on Stefanyka Street in Lviv, perfect for those on the go but unwilling to compromise on quality. Though small in size, it delivers big on taste — the baristas here are known for their craft and attention to detail. You’ll find expertly prepared espresso, flat whites, filter options, and even alternative brews, all served fast and with a smile. It’s a favorite stop for students, locals, and coffee lovers who appreciate a quick, high-quality cup just a few steps from Lviv’s historic center. Great for grab-and-go or a quick pause in your day.

name: Mitte
shortDescription: A modern café with clean aesthetics, craft coffee, and a creative vibe — perfect for focused work or stylish meetups.
longDescription: Mitte is a sleek, modern café in Lviv that blends minimalism with warmth. Known for its clean lines, thoughtful design, and perfectly balanced coffee, it attracts creatives, freelancers, and coffee lovers alike. The menu features espresso classics, alternative brewing methods, and light snacks, all made with care. Large windows let in natural light, making it ideal for reading, working, or quiet reflection. It’s a place where quality, calm, and community come together. Every detail — from the ceramics to the playlists — feels intentional and inspiring.

name: Black Honey
shortDescription: A trendy coffee spot on Kryva Lypa with bold brews, cool vibes, and a buzzing crowd — perfect for coffee dates or people-watching.
longDescription: Black Honey on Kryva Lypa is one of Lviv’s most iconic specialty coffee spots. With its lively location, stylish interior, and top-tier coffee, it draws in everyone from coffee purists to curious passersby. The baristas here really know their craft — offering espresso-based drinks, pour-overs, cold brews, and seasonal specials. The space combines urban energy with cozy corners, making it great for casual meetups, quick caffeine fixes, or just soaking in the vibe of the street. The desserts are just as good as the coffee — don’t skip the cheesecake!

name: Tribe
shortDescription: A cozy, community-driven café with specialty coffee, plants, and a warm, creative vibe — like a second home.
longDescription: Tribe is more than just a coffee shop — it’s a space built around connection, creativity, and calm. Nestled in Lviv, this café welcomes you with a warm atmosphere, leafy greenery, and soft music. Their coffee is top-notch: from rich espresso to smooth filter brews and seasonal drinks. Tribe often hosts events, pop-ups, and collaborations with local artists, adding a layer of cultural vibrancy. It’s a great place to meet like-minded people, work on your next idea, or simply enjoy a mindful coffee break. Come once — and you’ll want to be part of the tribe.

name: UNO City Cafe
shortDescription: Gastronomic and coffee space with a view of the Opera House. A bright, urban café with panoramic windows, signature drinks, and a stylish yet relaxed atmosphere.
longDescription: UNO City Cafe is a modern city coffee shop with an elegant interior, large windows and a pleasant atmosphere. It is ideal for a leisurely breakfast, a productive working day or a cozy meeting with friends. It serves specialty coffee, signature drinks, and delicious breakfasts, bowls, sandwiches, and desserts. The spacious hall, comfortable seats and good lighting make UNO City Cafe a great option for both relaxation and focus. This is a place where you want to come back - for the taste, comfort and rhythm of the big city.
